verses.text: Many seek an audience with a ruler, but it is from the LORD that man gets justice.
The righteous detest the dishonest; the wicked detest the upright.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 29:26
rsbNotes.text: 29:26 Wisdom recognizes the special function of rulers to maintain godly order, and thus to be agents of Godâ€™s rule (21:1 note). It also recognizes the weakness of human rulers. Here the supplicant seeks special treatment that would involve injustice. The only sure way to justice is to seek it from the Lord.
